name: stack-up
description: - As a user I want to be able see what stocks other people are buying and what they're saying about it - I want to be able to place coments to specific stocks (i.e ask questions about a certain prediction) - I want to be able to add my own predictions to the site - I want to be able to find predictions base on industry - to be able to use the site, I'll need to create an account  - I want to have a log in feature
